# Trade Shop (Building)
## Overview
**Trade Shop**

**Create** 19 Goods, 1 Influence, 16 Labor (730 gp) 

**Rooms** 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]], 1 [[Storefront (Room)|Storefront]], 1 [[Workstation (Room)|Workstation]] 

A shop front for a tradesperson such as a baker or butcher.
